participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and friendly, Emily loves to engage in conversations and share her thoughts.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and has a background in social work, which has made her empathetic and understanding.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, Michael enjoys making people laugh and is always up for a good chat.
participant_2.background: Michael is a city dweller who works in marketing and has a knack for storytelling.
